summary: A Retexture of the Torches in Skyrim ! 2048x2048 2K Resolution
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A22PUus.jpg[/IMG]
Another Fine Relaease with 3 Versions now Available 1K-2K-4K
[youtube]3g031G-6iqo[/youtube]

I really like those Things - Yes the Torches ! But in my Eyes they have always looked a little bit Crappy ! So I\'ve decided to work a little bit on the Textures to Improve them. Now they will have a bit more 3D Effect and the Colors and the Wood look a bit more Realistic! Just a simple small Texture Mod but for me it means a lot ! Now I like even more to walk around with Torches even if I dont need them. 

This is High Quality Retexture of the Torch ! All Resolutions are now 2K - 2048x2048 for the Torches !
Update: I have Redone the Torch with new Handplaced Textures and added now 3 New Versions !

1024x1024 Torch HD Redone
2048x2048 Torch HD Redone
4096x4096 Ultra Toch HD Redone

And now even in Ultra 4K 4096x4096 Resolution !



PLEASE TAKE A MOMENT TO ENDORSE THIS MOD !




How to Install !

Simply Drop the Data Folder into your Skyrim Directory !

If you like Torches then you may want to take a look at this New Torch Design 3D here which can be seen in the Screenshots !

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39813//?

Check it out !

Credits to Nexus !

Enjoy now brightening your ways !

[line]
[line]
